item.description:
We have a surprise visit from the new Cessna Skycatcher.

 That's right, John Miles will be flying it in from Maine Aircraft Sales. This is right off the assembly line. Of course, we need some decent wx for him to be here. But we are all planning on it.

 

 

 

We will also have a discussion on todays technology in General Aviation. Smart phones, Ipads and the like are here to stay. Mark Estabrook will talk about his VFR Flight Planning to Oshkosh he is using for this years trek. Matt and I will go over some of the Smart Phone apps  and Ipad apps. Bring your favorite gadget with you. As well as your questions. This is for part of the Geek Squads in all us pilots!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Updates on local flying events, our fly outs and more.

----------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site
